dmca.title: mobiledia.com complains of cell site cloning
dmca.body:
The copyrighted work at issue is the website on http://www.holdcell.com/ which is a direct scraper site of our site (http://www.mobiledia.com).

Search Query: site:www.holdcell.com Infringing Web Pages: All 1,680 pages

3.	Contact Information:
[private] ([private]@mobiledia.com) +1.[private]
[private]
Las Vegas, NV 89113

4.	Owner/Administrator of the allegedly infringing webpage [private] ([private]@holdcell.com)
+1.[private]
[private]
Beaumont, AB T4X 1E6
CA

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear; under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

[private]
